dublin_core.dcvalue: Heart attack risk calculators are readily accessible on the world wide web offering potentially powerful means of health education and risk awareness Laypersons may be unaware of differences in applicability risk calculation algorithms and output formats among such calculators This study assesses the impact of basic web searching terms on type of calculator accessed and on the resulting risk score
"First-hit" heart attack risk calculators on the world wide web: implications for laypersons and healthcare practitioners.
